mapper.select: SELECT c.*, o.id orderId, o.courier_send_time courierSendTime, o.sender_time senderTime, o.send_total_money sendTotalMoney, co.`type`, IFNULL(p.money,0) money, IFNULL(p.over_time,0) overTime, IFNULL(p.over_type, '0') overType, IFNULL(p.over_money, 0) overMoney, IFNULL(p.over_unit, 0) overUnit, IFNULL(p.money1,0) money1, IFNULL(p.over_time1,0) overTime1, IFNULL(p.over_type1, '0') overType1, IFNULL(p.over_money1, 0) overMoney1, IFNULL(p.over_unit1, 0) overUnit1, o.code_id codeId FROM zhinenggui_cabinets c LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM zhinenggui_order ) o ON c.id = o.send_door_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM zhinenggui_code WHERE STATUS = '0') co ON o.`code_id` = co.`id` LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM zhinenggui_door_price) p ON c.id = p.door_id WHERE o.id = #{oid} AND c.status = 0 LIMIT 1

SELECT c.*, o.id orderId, o.courier_send_time courierSendTime, o.sender_time senderTime, o.send_total_money sendTotalMoney, IFNULL(p.money,0) money, IFNULL(p.over_time,0) overTime, IFNULL(p.over_type, '0') overType, IFNULL(p.over_money, 0) overMoney, IFNULL(p.over_unit, 0) overUnit, IFNULL(p.money1,0) money1, IFNULL(p.over_time1,0) overTime1, IFNULL(p.over_type1, '0') overType1, IFNULL(p.over_money1, 0) overMoney1, IFNULL(p.over_unit1, 0) overUnit1 FROM zhinenggui_cabinets c LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM zhinenggui_order WHERE `state` = '400') o ON c.id = o.send_door_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM zhinenggui_door_price) p ON c.id = p.door_id WHERE o.`getter_phone` = #{sendDeviceId} AND o.id = #{phone} AND c.status = 0 LIMIT 1

SELECT c.*, p.money, p.over_time overTime , p.over_type overType , p.over_money overMoney , p.over_unit overUnit FROM zhinenggui_cabinets c LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM zhinenggui_door_price WHERE STATUS = '0') p ON c.id = p.door_id WHERE c.device_id = #{deviceId} AND c.door_size = #{doorSize} AND c.state = '1' AND c.status = 0 LIMIT 1

SELECT c.*, o.id orderId, o.courier_send_time courierSendTime, o.send_total_money sendTotalMoney, p.money, p.over_time overTime , p.over_type overType , p.over_money overMoney, p.over_unit overUnit FROM zhinenggui_cabinets c LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM zhinenggui_order WHERE `state` = '2') o ON c.id = o.send_door_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM zhinenggui_code WHERE TYPE = '3') co ON o.`code_id` = co.`id` LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM zhinenggui_door_price ) p ON c.id = p.door_id WHERE c.device_id = #{deviceId} AND c.status = 0

SELECT o.id orderId, o.courier_send_time courierSendTime, d.device_remark deviceRemark, c.plate_id plateId, c.door_id doorId, c.total_door_id totalDoorId, o.getter_phone getterPhone, o.state FROM zhinenggui_order o LEFT JOIN zhinenggui_cabinets c ON c.id = o.send_door_id LEFT JOIN zhinenggui_device d on d.device_id = c.device_id WHERE o.courier_send_id = #{userId} AND o.state = '400' AND o.`status` = '0'
SELECT o.*,c.door_id , c.plate_id, c.total_door_id FROM zhinenggui_order o LEFT JOIN zhinenggui_cabinets c ON o.`get_door_id` = c.id WHERE o.get_device_id = #{deviceId} AND o.state = '200'

SELECT o.id id, o.sender_phone senderPhone, o.getter_phone getterPhone, o.update_date updateDate, o.express_number expressNumber, c.total_door_id totalDoorId, c.door_size doorSize, o.state state FROM zhinenggui_order AS o LEFT JOIN zhinenggui_cabinets AS c ON c.id = o.send_door_id WHERE o.state != '600' AND o.send_device_id = #{deviceId} AND o.courier_send_id =#{userId}

SELECT o.id id, o.sender_phone senderPhone, o.getter_phone getterPhone, o.update_date updateDate, o.express_number expressNumber, c.total_door_id totalDoorId, c.door_size doorSize, o.state state, u.phone courierPhone FROM zhinenggui_order AS o LEFT JOIN zhinenggui_cabinets AS c ON c.id = o.send_door_id LEFT JOIN zhinenggui_user u ON o.courier_send_id = u.id WHERE o.state != '600'AND (o.send_device_id = #{deviceId} OR o.get_device_id = #{deviceId})

SELECT concat( d.device_remark, c.total_door_id, '柜门' ) addr, o.id order_id, o.express_number, o.courier_send_name, u.phone courier_phone, IF(o.user_id is null , o.sender_time ,o.courier_send_time) send_time, c.total_door_id, o.send_total_money, cd.`code` FROM zhinenggui_order o LEFT JOIN zhinenggui_device d ON o.send_device_id = d.device_id LEFT JOIN zhinenggui_cabinets c ON o.send_door_id = c.id LEFT JOIN zhinenggui_user u on o.courier_send_id = u.id LEFT JOIN zhinenggui_code cd on cd.id = o.code_id WHERE o.status = 0 AND o.state = '400' AND o.send_device_id = ${deviceId} AND o.getter_phone = ${phone}

SELECT concat( d.device_remark, c.total_door_id, '柜门' ) addr, o.id order_id, o.send_device_id device_id, o.sender_time send_time, o.express_number, o.courier_send_name, u.phone courier_phone, IF(o.user_id is null , o.sender_time ,o.courier_send_time) send_time, c.total_door_id, o.send_total_money, cd.`code` FROM zhinenggui_order o LEFT JOIN zhinenggui_device d ON o.send_device_id = d.device_id LEFT JOIN zhinenggui_cabinets c ON o.send_door_id = c.id LEFT JOIN zhinenggui_user u on o.courier_send_id = u.id LEFT JOIN zhinenggui_code cd on cd.id = o.code_id WHERE o.status = 0 AND o.getter_phone = #{phone}
